A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok\, just saw the new Star Wars movie.  Wow\, it was terrible.  Were the critics paid to say this movie was good?   I have been a long time Star Wars fan\, not any more.  Too many plot holes\, inconsistencies\, shameless creature cameos for plush toy sales (I'm talking about you Porgs) \, and the total disregard of the history and feel of a Star Wars movie.  This will be the last Star Wars movie I will see.  So sad\, so much potential.
